did.unittitle:
Conference of Deans (University of Michigan) records
1920-1968
did.abstract: Minutes, 1920-1968, of the Conference of Deans of the University of Michigan. Also includes Chronological files of agenda, minutes, background documents, etc.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The records were received from donors nos. 343 and 1002.

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open without restriction.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Conference of Deans (University of Michigan) Records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Inaugurated by President Burton in 1920, the conference was an informal organization, meeting weekly, which gave the president and deans a chance to consider problems common to all. The minutes and associated reports give an overview of the concerns brought before the conference.

scopecontent.p: Minutes, 1920-1968, of the Conference of Deans of the University of Michigan. Also includes Chronological files of agenda, minutes, bulletins to deans, background documents, etc. An index of the papers (September 1937 -- June 1941) is included.
